LanguageData.ATB_WatchdogGenerator.label: Watchdog Unit
LanguageData.ATB_WatchdogGenerator.description: An uninitialized mechanical wolf-analogue designed for guard, assault, search and destroy, and support duties. Watchdogs are intelligent enough and capable of charging.
LanguageData.ATB_TORTGenerator.label: TORT Unit
LanguageData.ATB_TORTGenerator.description: An uninitialized mechanical tortoise-analogue designed for both short and long range transportation services. TORT units are intelligent enough and capable of charging.
LanguageData.ATB_MineralUnitGenerator.label: Mineral Unit
LanguageData.ATB_MineralUnitGenerator.description: An uninitialized mechanical sheep-analogue designed for producing steel. This unit necessitates organic matter consumption, and can not charge.
LanguageData.ATB_NutritionUnitGenerator.label: Nutrition Unit
LanguageData.ATB_NutritionUnitGenerator.description: An uninitialized mechanical cow-analogue designed for producing high-grade high-efficiency milk. This unit necessitates organic matter consumption, and can not charge.
LanguageData.ATB_ChemUnitGenerator.label: Chemical processing unit
LanguageData.ATB_ChemUnitGenerator.description: An uninitialized mechanical hen-analogue designed for producing neutroamine or chemfuel precursors. This unit necessitates organic matter consumption, and can not charge.
LanguageData.ATB_MicroScytherGenerator.label: MicroScyther
LanguageData.ATB_MicroScytherGenerator.description: An uninitialized mechanical drone designed for swarming targets. They have a severely limited battery lifespan, yield nothing when destroyed, and attack anything that isn't a microscyther.
